contents.name: Furikake Chicken Salad
contents.description: It's just furikake chicken in a salad...

contents.bio: I'm just trying to find myself through food.
Yeah, I know I'm a child prodigy of the force but like... you guys don't know what I'm going through. I'm just going through some troubling times right now.
Everything just tastes good! So, I just give everything fives and favorite it. I'm just hungry all the time, okay!?
I raid Tombs and stuff. I guess you could say I'm quite the adventurous gal.
